meanings.definition: A room in a store where products are displayed for sale.
meanings.sent1: The showroom had shiny cars on display.
meanings.sent2: I visited the showroom to look at new furniture.
meanings.sent3: The showroom was so full of gadgets, it felt like a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the showroom like a beacon in the night.
meanings.sent5: The showroom sparkled with all the latest electronics.

meanings.definition: A room in a house where guests are received.
meanings.sent1: The showroom was elegantly decorated for the party.
meanings.sent2: We gathered in the showroom to welcome our guests.
meanings.sent3: The showroom became a hub of laughter and conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her hospitality turned the showroom into a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The showroom echoed with the sounds of friendly chatter.
